revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

opener.dateline:
Camden, New Jersey
U S America June 13 1876.

body.p: Your subscription for my Book is received—for which hearty thanks. Excuse delay, should there be any—the small first edition being exhausted, and another now in press. Your Volumes will be sent by mail, soon as ready, (which will not be very long)—
